languages.text: While Sire is alive, all enemies get -10 to will

languages.text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his enemies suffer a −10 penalty to Willpower.

languages.text: Пока Предок жив, все его противники получают штраф −10 к Воле.
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his enemies suffer a −10 penalty to Willpower.

traits.locale_text: Пока Предок жив, все его противники получают штраф −10 к Воле.
Пока Предок жив, все его противники получают штраф −10 к Воле.

languages.text: Mientras el progenitor siga con vida, todos sus enemigos sufren una penalización de −10 a su Voluntad.
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his enemies suffer a −10 penalty to Willpower.

traits.locale_text: Mientras el progenitor siga con vida, todos sus enemigos sufren una penalización de −10 a su Voluntad.

languages.text: サイアが生きている限り、敵はすべて意志力に-10のペナルティを受ける。
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his enemies suffer a −10 penalty to Willpower.

traits.locale_text: サイアが生きている限り、敵はすべて意志力に-10のペナルティを受ける。

languages.text: 只要虫群族长存活，所有敌对单位的意志就会降低10点。
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his enemies suffer a −10 penalty to Willpower.

traits.locale_text: 只要虫群族长存活，所有敌对单位的意志就会降低10点。

languages.text: Solange der Schöpfer lebt, haben alle seine Gegner einen Abzug von −10 auf Willenskraft.
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his enemies suffer a −10 penalty to Willpower.

traits.locale_text: Solange der Schöpfer lebt, haben alle seine Gegner einen Abzug von -10 auf Willenskraft.

languages.text: Tant que le Sire est en vie, tous ses alliés souffrent d'une pénalité de −10 à la Force mentale.
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his enemies suffer a −10 penalty to Willpower.

traits.locale_text: Tant que le Sire est en vie, tous ses alliés souffrent d'une pénalité de −10 à la Force mentale.
Tant que le Sire est en vie, tous ses alliés souffrent d'une pénalité de -10 à la Volonté.

languages.text: Tüm düşmanlar, İrade niteliklerine −10 ceza puanı alır. Bu etki, Efendi sağ olduğu sürece devam eder.
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his enemies suffer a −10 penalty to Willpower.
